name: Vikings Pandaemonium
description:
CONTROLS:

-  WASD:                              walk
- Left Mouse Button:   shoot and everything else
- 1/2/3:                                select weapon

You are Hägar, an old viking warrior who fought countless battles against enemies of all kinds, some of them were even considered not to be of mortal origin. Not a single one ever managed to wound you so people started to think that you were invincible and your enemies started calling you Hägar the horrible.
But then you died. (Probably Corona? Unfortunately, there were no vaccines.) One day you went to sleep, but when you woke up you were in a totally different place. Everything was dark, the only source of light was your old axe. It was lying right next to you, seemingly glowing from within .

You look around and recognize the place, it is the old graveyard next to your village. But it had never been so dark here before, it is not just a dark night. There are no stars, no moon, no source of light at all. Simply pure darkness surrounding you. Suddenly you hear a howling noise, and two red flames appear in the darkness. But even though the fire is bright you can't see a silouhette or anything that is connected to the flames. The flames are moving closer and closer towards your circle of sight. The moment they reach it you realize it's the darkness itself, trying to reach you and swallow you. A piece of darkness separates from the blurred mass of shadows and crawls towards you with eyes of fire. You grab your axe and swing it at the shadow beast. You can only gues the direction but suddenly a crackling ball of lightning bursts out of the tip of your axe, right into the shadows face. You are as suprised as the shadow, which is thrown back into the void. As you look down on your axe burning letters start to appear on the shaft:

"A weapon given to the worthy to defend the weak ones!“ Thor

You hear a voice arising in your head:
„You have proven yourself worthy! Welcome to Valhalla! Ragnarök broke out, we no longer need you to fight the mortal realms. Defend Valhalla by all means. Take this weapon. You are the chosen champion of Asgard!“
Odin

In addition to your axe which is now empowered to throw lightning you find yourself holding a mighty spear in your left hand. You are the only one who can save the world from sinking into chaos.
